an10.240-266:1: "Bhikkhus, for full understanding of lust … for the utter destruction … for the abandoning … for the destruction … for the vanishing … for the fading away … for the cessation …[n.298] HereCeand Ee additionally insertupasamāya("for the pacification").for the giving up … for the relinquishment of lust … these ten things are to be developed."
